hero.name: Joel
hero.description: Front-end Developer with strong knowledge of JavaScript and experience in building responsive and interactive web applications. Dedicated to optimizing web performance and creating accessible, visually appealing interfaces that provide a satisfying user experience.

experience.description: I was part of a team that developed a system using Angular. I designed and executed extensive test cases, managed defect reporting and tracking, and collaborated closely with the team to ensure the quality and functionality of the final product.
